GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Fix potential memory leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 0672215994e2347a9b4f145e2bc1709b1e01cee3. For more details please see the references link.
